Interface EntityListenerHandler

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContextService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextServiceImpl
public interface EntityListenerHandler
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface defines a Entity Listener Handler.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

Method Summary
